name: Spy Escape - The Office
description:
As members of S.T.E.A.L.T.H. you have been ordered to infiltrate and search the office of the suspected leader of a secret organisation seeking a new world order!

Can you discover the organisation's plans and escape the office before you are discovered?

Note: to fully enjoy this game we strongly recommend that you download and print some additional materials.

These can be found at:
www.mountainvirtualescapegames.com/officedownload
